title: Decentralized
description: Ensures your traffic is truly private and untraceable by routing it through 2 or 5 independent servers.

title: Zero-knowledge Network
description: BraveVPN's zero-knowledge network means neither Brave nor its operators can link you to what you do online, even if we tried.

title: Noise
description: Anti-surveillance techniques that make traffic patterns hard to discover and nearly impossible to track what you do online, even against AI technology.

title: Advanced Encryption
description: Choose between multi-layered encryption with either WireGuard or the Brave Noise Generating Mixnet (NGM) for maximal data security.

title: Independent Operators
description: The Brave network is independently operated by people across the world. Your traffic is never centralized or traceable.

title: Unlinkable Payments
description: Your payments in fiat currencies or crypto are unlinkable to your usage of BraveVPN thanks to zk-brave anonymous credentials.
